name: vscode-language-merlin6502
description: Merlin assembly language for 6502 family of processors

merlin6502.case.caseSensitive.description: Lower case mnemonics are considered an error.

merlin6502.case.lowerCaseCompletions.markdownDescription: Use lower case in completions and snippets (ingored if `#merlin6502.caseSensitive#`).

merlin6502.columns.c1.markdownDescription: Width of the label column to use in formatting

merlin6502.columns.c2.markdownDescription: Width of the instruction column to use in formatting

merlin6502.columns.c3.markdownDescription: Width of the operand column to use in formatting

merlin6502.version.markdownDescription: Accept syntax for this version of Merlin

merlin6502.linker.detect.markdownDescription: Threshold to trigger interpretation as a linker command file.  This is the ratio of occurrences of ASM, LNK, or LKV, to lines in the document.

merlin6502.completions.ibas.markdownDescription: Offer address completions applicable to Integer BASIC

merlin6502.completions.abas.markdownDescription: Offer address completions applicable to Applesoft BASIC

merlin6502.hovers.specialAddresses.markdownDescription: Show hovers for special addresses such as ROM routines, soft switches, etc.

merlin6502.hovers.mnemonics.markdownDescription: Show hovers for opcode mnemonics such as `LDA`, `STA`, etc.

merlin6502.hovers.pseudo.markdownDescription: Show hovers for pseudo-opcode mnemonics such as `EQU`, `ASC`, etc.

merlin6502.disassembly.brk.markdownDescription: Recognize BRK instruction and operand during disassembly

merlin6502.diagnostics.live.markdownDescription: Update diagnostics on any document change.  If not, then only update on save document.  If you are editing large files it may be helpful to uncheck this.

commands.title: merlin6502: Format for copy and paste into Merlin 8
merlin6502: Insert from Virtual ][ front machine
merlin6502: Insert from AppleWin save state

scripts.reset-client:windows: npx rimraf client\out && mkdir client\out && copy client\src\*.scpt client\out
scripts.reset-client:default: npx rimraf client/out && mkdir client/out && cp client/src/*.scpt client/out
scripts.reset-server:windows: npx rimraf server\out && mkdir server\out && copy server\src\*.wasm server\out
scripts.reset-server:default: npx rimraf server/out && mkdir server/out && cp server/src/*.wasm server/out
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run esbuild-client -- --minify && npm run esbuild-server -- --minify
scripts.build: npm run esbuild-client -- --sourcemap && npm run esbuild-server -- --sourcemap
scripts.test-compile: npm run reset-client && tsc -p ./client/ && npm run reset-server && tsc -p ./server/
